entry.title: Re @ID_AA_Carmack Similarly high cycle life with nickel cathode is possible if optimizing for that. Adding silicon to (primarily carbon) anode, which ...
entry.summary: Re @ID_AA_Carmack Similarly high cycle life with nickel cathode is possible if optimizing for that. Adding silicon to (primarily carbon) anode, which improves energy density, reduces cycle life, due to large volumetric changes during charge/discharge.
